text: Santiago Giraldo was the defending champion, but decided not to participate. Paolo Lorenzi defeated Rogério Dutra da Silva 7–5, 6–2 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ===Bottom Half=== ==References== * Main Draw * Qualifying Draw Seguros Bolivar Open Pereira - Singles 2011 Singles
title: 2011 Seguros Bolívar Open Pereira – Singles
